duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and post-project data analysis.
Provide expertise in science topics for item development, scoring process, and client meetings.
Communicate with various roles through email, chat, phone, and videoconference meetings.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in the expectations of their roles and how to perform those duties.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science, Physical Sciences, or related field (Master’s preferred)
Two (2) years assessment industry experience as a Scoring Director or other scoring team lead or equivalent experience
